item.title: A Wordament Solver
item.description: Introduction When I was younger, I used to play a word game called Boggle, where one would try to find as many words as possible from random letters. I had always suspected that I wasn’t good at the game; luckily for me, Wordament, Microsoft’s online multiplayer tournament version, left me in no doubt at all. Clearly, if I was to improve my score, I would need to diligently practice cheat.
